Pinstate
[Example Web Pages]

The "../src/webpages/pinstate" folder contains a very simple example of how to display the state of a PIC port pin on a web page. It will display the state of port pin B1 on a web page. To change the port pin, simple edit the b01 line in the "main.cgi" file.
